channel.title: attack.t1070.003 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1070.003 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Clearing Windows Console History
item.description: Identifies when a user attempts to clear console history. An adversary may clear the command history of a compromised account to conceal the actions undertaken during an intrusion.

item.title: Cisco Clear Logs
item.description: Clear command history in network OS which is used for defense evasion

item.title: Clear Command History
item.description: Clear command history in linux which is used for defense evasion.

item.title: Suspicious IO.FileStream
item.description: Open a handle on the drive volume via the \.\ DOS device path specifier and perform direct access read of the first few bytes of the volume.
